H0.text: what lands did henry hudson discover. Labrador Coast

H1.text: what lands did henry hudson discover. James Bay

H2.text: what lands did henry hudson discover. Baffin Island

H3.text: what lands did henry hudson discover. Hudson Bay

A4.text: English explorers and colonists named Hudson Bay after Sir Henry Hudson who explored the bay beginning 2 August 1610, on his ship Discovery.

A5.text: On his fourth voyage to North America, Hudson worked his way around Greenland's west coast and into the bay, mapping much of its eastern coast.
